version_description:
- You can set course based reminders to get more from your courses
- Empty states of our My Courses and Wishlist UI is more friendly
- Performance and stability improvements

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates.

- Performance and stability improvements

- Bug fixes, performance and stability improvements

- Video player improvements
- Bug fixes, performance and stability improvements

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates.

- New instructor profiles accessible from the course information screen
- Video player improvements
- Bug fixes, performance and stability improvements

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates.

- New instructor profiles accessible from the course information screen
- My courses loading crash fix
- Many other bug fixes, performance and stability improvements 

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates

- New full screen video player that’s easier to use and has higher performance. Swipe right or left to navigate to different lectures.
- Freezing issue on app launch fixed
- Many other bug fixes, performance and stability improvements 

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates

- Bug fixes, performance and stability improvements 

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates

- Added ability to adjust video playback quality. Just tap on the More icon in the video player to switch to the video quality to suit your watching experience
- Some visual love to make the app feel more consistent
- Bug fixes, performance and stability improvements

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates

- Added ability to adjust video playback quality. Just tap on the More icon in the video player to switch to the video quality to suit your watching experience
- Some visual love to make the app feel more consistent
- Bug fixes, performance and stability improvements

Thanks for using Udemy! We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates

- Added ability to adjust video quality for download in app Settings
- Once a lecture is completed, the video player now previews the next lecture in a nifty transition screen
- Fixed some annoying bugs and improved the app's performance

- Fixed video loading issues and improved the app's performance

- 性能和稳定性改进
我们通常每隔几周便更新应用程序。您可以前往“设置>iTunes Store 与 App Store>自动下载”中打开更新，便能自动更新应用程序（无须返回此处查看）

- Performance and stability improvements

We usually update the app every few weeks. You can update the app automatically (without checking back here) by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and turning on Updates.

- 效能和穩定性改善

我們通常每隔幾周就會更新應用程式。只要前往「設定」>「iTunes 與 App Store」>「自動下載與更新」，然後開啟更新，您就可以設定自動更新程式 (無須返回此處查看)

- 效能和穩定性改善

我們通常每隔幾周就會更新應用程式。只要前往「設定」>「iTunes 與 App Store」>「自動下載與更新」，然後開啟更新，您就可以設定自動更新程式 (無須返回此處查看)

- 效能和穩定性改善

Course recommendations are now more personalized based on your interests. We've also resolved a few bugs related to payment and Google sign up.
Course recommendations are now more personalized based on your interests. We’ve also resolved a few more bugs related to payment and Google sign up.

- Airplay button is back
- Additional stability improvements
- Bugfixes and performance improvements
- Bugfixes and performance improvements
- Bugfixes and performance improvements

今天，我们很高兴与大家分享我们的新品牌！只需要更新就可以看到新的外观。

对我们来说，这是一个激动人心的进步，我们迫不及待地想看看您能做些什么。

感谢您在 Udemy 上学习！此更新包括对 iPad 上的多任务处理的支持。现在，您可以使用“分屏多任务”或“分屏”与您喜欢的应用一起运行 Udemy。

使用 iOS14？现在，当您不在 Udemy 应用中时，可以使用画中画来继续学习。

感谢您在 Udemy 上学习！此更新包括对 iPad 上的多任务处理的支持。现在，您可以使用“分屏多任务”或“分屏”与您喜欢的应用一起运行 Udemy。

使用 iOS14？现在，当您不在 Udemy 应用中时，可以使用画中画来继续学习。
